remarks: Value of an evaluated coefficient in a finite group sum of polynomials. (Contributed by AV, 8-Oct-2019.)
statement:
coe1fzgsumd.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1fzgsumd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1fzgsumd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
coe1fzgsumd.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. NN0 ) $.
coe1fzgsumd.m $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. N M e. B ) $.
coe1fzgsumd.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
coe1fzgsumd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( coe1 ` ( P gsum ( x e. N |-> M ) ) ) ` K ) = ( R gsum ( x e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` M ) ` K ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
